articles.author: Diego Colman
articles.title: Gold Price Forecast: Bullish Breakout Continuation Hinges on US Jobs Data - DailyFX
articles.description: Gold surges past crucial resistance levels, hitting its highest mark since December of the previous year. The sustainability of this week's bullish breakout, however, depends on the upcoming U.S. jobs report.
articles.content:
GOLD PRICE OUTLOOK:
  • Gold prices (XAU/USD) rally vigorously, reaching their highest level since late December
  • However, these gains might be at risk of reversal next week if U.S. jobs … [+3289 chars]

articles.author: Justinas Baltrusaitis
articles.title: Why $81,000 might be realistic target for Bitcoin before halving - Finbold - Finance in Bold
articles.description: Bitcoin has commenced March on a high note, establishing its price above the $60,000 support zone and achieving the highest monthly close.
